author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1705776460}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057093633', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 220, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1685650307}
review:
[h1]KART KAZANMA OYUNU[/h1]
Bu oyun tam bir kart kasma oyunudur!

Ülkemiz şartlarında oyuna artık para yatırmak lüks sayılıyor.

Bu yüzden oyuncular sanal ticaretlere atıldı. Bunlardan birisi de steam üzerinde kart kasarak paranızı katlamak, ve ben incelemelerimde tamda buna göre olan oyunları bulunduruyorum eğer paranızı iki veya üç katına çıkartıp oyun sayınızın artmasını istiyorsanız profilimi ve diğer incelemelerimi takip edebilirsiniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198373924597', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1695270786}
review:
Alright. I'll be the first to admit I like this little game a little too much for what it really is! . . . But at the same time, isn't it what well-made little finds are supposed to achieve?!

In these quick head-to-head matches, you just pick a character (Marilyn, Roger Federer, or a pink 'Darth Vader', etc.) and you throw your absurd weapon (lipstick, light saber, or tennis racket, etc.) at your rival who stands on an opposing platform out in space, which is randomly located each time.

In case this doesn't scream "stupidly awesome" enough to you, let me add that the game is actually really well-made! It runs smoothly without issues, and the effects of the wind and gravity feel quite realistic, forcing you to smartly anticipate your strength and angle before each throw. And with winds changing each turn, here you have your nice little challenge all cut-out for you! 

After a certain point, especially after your rival hits you on the 'helmet' ([spoiler]or skull [/spoiler]) a few times, the quick back-and-forth rapidly becomes all personal and rivalries start to emerge (or long-time friendships begin to end). 

Of course I would love more players ('any' players for that matter) in the multiplayer rooms. And I hope the devs adjust the points (*stars*) system as it takes too long to unlock all characters (I really want my 'Money Man' aka: Lord Gaben!)

But outside of this, it's really just a nice little gem. Perfect to challenge some friends in a space-duel, or even to play at a party (maybe even as a tournament) on a single computer with anyone present and brave enough to face-off in this colorful corner of our dark universe.

May the solar winds be with you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049823783', 'num_games_owned': 1712, 'num_reviews': 1265, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1679112612}
review:
Es un Gunbound-Worms de disparos por turnos, excelentes graficos, buena musica, jugabilidad moderada (lo de que las plataformas suban y bajen solo es cuestion de tener timing y todo se reduce a tirar tiros rectos, no da lugar a otras combinaciones lo mismo porque no hay mas de un solo tipo de disparo).

Se disfruta bastante, es barato, podes jugar con amigos, tiene remote play y hay jugador contra jugador en pantalla compartida, lo cual claramente te permite jugar con amigos sin necesidad de comprar mas de 1 titulo. Tiene cromos tambien y ayuda mucho!

en definitiva, un juego casual, bastante bueno, de combate por turnos, corto pero interesante, si te gusta el genero, dale una oportunidad, mas si tenes algun amigo con quien jugar.

7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6549, 'last_played': 1649291903}
review:
首先游戏的画面和音效极其糟糕。画面粗糙，模型简陋，颜色搭配刺眼，给人一种低级的感觉。音效方面，游戏的背景音乐和音效不仅单调，而且重复性很强，让人很快感到厌烦。

其次游戏的操作和玩法也存在很多问题。游戏的操作方式简单，但是手感却非常糟糕。角色的移动和跳跃都显得非常僵硬，让游戏的整体体验大打折扣。至于游戏玩法，除了不断地破坏和射击，没有太多的深度和变化，很快就会让人感到单调。

此外游戏的难度设置也有问题。虽然游戏提供了不同的难度选择，但是无论选择哪个难度，游戏都显得过于简单，缺乏挑战性。这使得游戏失去了应有的紧张感和成就感。

最后游戏的售后服务也让人不满。我在游戏中遇到了一些问题，向开发商反馈后，却长时间没有得到回应。这让人感到被忽视，对游戏的满意度大打折扣。

综上所述，Mr Blaster是一款画面粗糙、音效糟糕、操作僵硬、玩法单调且难度设置不合理的游戏。我建议玩家们在购买前务必三思，以免像我一样失望。

author: {'steamid': '76561198120250232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1622142995}
review:
Just another abandoned dead game by developers.
Forget about physics - wind, distance to the opponent and their position on the map. This does not matter at all. The projectile flies as it pleases.
Most of the achievements are not working properly or broken. And depends mostly on the multiplayer games but multiplayer is dead. 
You cant even play 1v1 against your friend (except on the same pc only) there will always be AI opponents in your match. They will waste your time and you will watch and wait their every move.
Do not buy this game at any price and any discount!

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1593979330}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Пиу пиу 1 на 1 с ботом или другими игроками. Пиу пиу - это кидание бомб в противника, местоположение которого мы знаем, но не видим на момент стрельбы... Нужно попасть точно в цель и убить врага. По сути все превращается в стрельбу в слепую, причем сама стрельба аля Angry Birds... Вытягиваем невидимую рогатку и пуляем... Трудно что-то еще сказать об игре в которой геймлея на один щелчок мышью... Скучно, неинтересно, не рекомендую.

[h1]Оценка: 2/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198867381725', 'num_games_owned': 2513, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 392, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1590122862}
review:
这个游戏跟朋友一起联机估计有点意思，一个人单机玩没什么游戏体验。AI喜欢演，如果你特别不准，它也扔得特别蛇；一旦你准起来了，对不起，它马上能给你来个爆头还击┑(￣Д ￣)┍

update:
反复试了很多次发现AI的弹道是不受风向和风速影响的，在相似的位置用相似方式自己扔弧线完全不一样，这种刻意加大难度降低乐趣的做法有点恶心单机玩家。另外关闭声音按钮有bug，上次关闭退出后，下次进入游戏虽然按钮是关闭状态但是还是有游戏声音。

author: {'steamid': '76561198286724621', 'num_games_owned': 2514, 'num_reviews': 453, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1548331431}
review:
太空版猫狗大战。砸人比砸星球伤害大些，砸空+撞到墙壁自己伤血。

初始可选人物只有两个。星星每局拿个200左右，购买人物需要的星星从750开始1k、1k地往上加，最高到8k。那么要玩多少局呢？
每局节奏很慢，一个人玩没什么动力刷_(:з」∠)_

author: {'steamid': '76561197983574011', 'num_games_owned': 1092, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1500205723}
review:
グラフィックが独特なので期待したのですが、ゲームは面白くありませんでした。ポトリスやshell shock liveに似たゲームで、山なりに飛ぶ攻撃で敵のHPを削り切ったら勝ちのゲームです。

敵との位置関係は初期配置から変えることができませんが、風の向きが毎回変わるのでそれを読んで投擲角度と強さを調整します。しかし前例の２ゲームと比べて、弾の種類は無く、地形要素も無いので、攻撃の凝りようがありません。フルパワーで直接まっすぐ狙ってれば良い気がします。

ターン制のせいかテンポが悪いし、そもそも浅いのでおすすめしません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198028673669', 'num_games_owned': 7010, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1501363950}
review:
Basically, i bought this game because of how confusing the gameplay looks in the trailer SO turns out it is confusing in-game as well:

-You are the constantly dabbing (ok Usain bolt pose not dabs k) dude, who is trying to hit another one on his planet - worms style - exactly the same thing as worms but you only have a *rocket launcher* + the wind is 2-dimensional now, it can basically blow in any direction, since you are in space (wind in space OKAY). Fighting is very poorly executed - you can't see your opponent, you can't zoom out when you are aiming, you have 3 usable zoom out bonuses per fight but even when you use them you can't shoot, when you start shooting you are zoomed back on your character. Playing vs bots feels frustrating because I CANT HIT A GOD DAMN THING and the wind is constantly changing, and to get the idea of how strong the wind is you have to play this game for like TEN HOURS I don't know, and the best I can do is TEN MINUTES, because bots hit you every single turn and PVP is non-existent because NOBODY plays this game.

+Visuals - the game is a good looking one, sadly bad gameplay realization kills it.
-Soundwork - in-game sounds are VERY annoying I had to mute the game after like 5 minutes of playing

+Online ranking that will never change because nobody plays multi
+Steam achievements that you never get because of the dead multiplayer
+Steam cards - they look nice.

Nothing to add - DISAPPOINTED. You can try to buy it if you have an actual friend that wants to play it with you, but why would you play this when you can play worms?

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1094449391

author: {'steamid': '76561198025491317', 'num_games_owned': 1535, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1500679407}
review:
I'm sorry to give Mr Blaster a thumbdown but, as of now, I don't feel like recommending it.
I usually do not write reviews as there are lot already about the games I play but, being this a new one, I thought that maybe I can help you decide wheter to buy it or not (and maybe at the same time help devs fix things).

I get this is mostly a time waster but this game wastes too much of your time, mostly through animations:
the intro in basically unskippable, the menù is animated, before every shot there's character animation.. feels too much time spent waiting compared to actual gameplay :\

Looks like the game hasn't been tested enough. First, options aren't saved.
I felt the urge to turn off effects because of that super annoying sound you hear whenever you hit any of the screen borders. Everytime you restart the game you hear sounds/music again, yet if you go into the options menù they appear as de-activated; this means you need to activate and the deactivate them to work -_-
Also, achievements either aren't correctly implemented or the descriptions need an update:
 - Multiplayer related ones do not unlock in one-computer matches (they are in multiplayer though).
 - I feel like achievements like FIRST WIN (Victory in the first match) and Perfect shot (Hit with the first shot) should have their description update to something like "win your first match" and such, as they can be unlocked not only during your fist match.
 - This leads me to Killer space (Hit every shot in the match) — I'm sure I did it but the achievement didn't unlock, what's the problem? do hitting planets/satellites not count? or hitting enemy and then the border invalidates it?
 - Girl Blaster needs correction in its description (Bolnde M)
 - aren't arms and legs part of the "body"? imho you should rename "body" to "chest". 

Multiplayer is still dead, guess it's normal since the game has just been released. Hope it will get active in the future.

Other minor stuff, mostly related to gameplay:
 - I'd really like to have a "quick rematch" button, instead of seeing the game logo, waiting for the menù to load, select mode and select character before being able to play again.
 - characters during matches are simply called "Fighter 1" and "Fighter 2".. why? every character has its own name, you even fetch correctly players name, why aren't you using them?
 - I also noticed that the game freezes a bit too much during the loading phase after the game's been started, and too often when a weapon is launched or is about to hit enemies/planets.
 - I feel like a wind indicator is needed, wind animation in the background is not enough sometime.
 - perhaps I didn't fully get how the game works yet but the impression I got in this short time I've played is that "same kind of winds" don't influence weapons trajectory in the same way.
 - skull/body hit are not always registered by the game it they happen after a "rebound" (ex. after hitting the planet). This should be improved as they give you bonus points.
 - if you're an achievement hunter be ready 'cause it's going to take a while to unlock all characters. UPDATE: Perhaps you won't need all of them; looking closely at achievements descriptions, and in particular at "Move stars Blaster" one, there's a "Trans Black" character there that doesn't appear in the game; looking at the achievement's image, the char figure is identical to Special Black's. This could mean that Special Black is needed for 2 achievements while Storm Man is needed for none. 6000 points (or whatever they are) saved if that's the case :)

---

That Worms, Crazy Planets etc. feeling made me curious about the game, I've enjoyed it so far but in its actual state I don't think it'll be able to keep me hooked for long :\
oh, thanks Forever Entertainment for giving me a free key ^_^

Feels like I'm forgetting something, I'll update if I were to remember :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197960286303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1500112933}
review:
Mr Blaster is a space based artillery game, released on Steam, iOS and Android.

You can find 10 minutes of gameplay with commentary here:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEQjwiUcjUI] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEQjwiUcjUI [/url] 

If you have played Worms or Scorched Earth from the MS-DOS days, then you would be familiar with the style of gameplay offered here. This version of artillery game is simplified though, with 2 players on separate platforms throwing items at each other. The steam page does say up to 4 players on PC, but I have not seen an option to select that.

Each shot is made based on power and angle, hits to the other players platform will do damage to their life bar and body or head shots will do more damage. There is a satelite orbiting each platform that acts as a minor barrier, it can take 2 hits before being destoryed but can save the player from taking damage. There is also the wind, that changes direction and strength with each turn, which will alter the trajectory of the thrown object. The wind is the only real thing that needs to be compensated for and I feel its designed this way due it also being a mobile release.

The AI in single player games varies from game to game. Sometimes it has lazer accuracy regardless of the wind, other times it will consistently miss. There is no campaign mode, just matches against a random player type. As for player types, there is a range of 13 that have a unique look and a unique projectile to throw, two come with the game and you can purchase the others using in game currency of stars. These are cosmetic, and do not effect gameplay. Each time you score a hit, you gain 25 stars, so it shouldn't take too long to be able to purchase a new character provided you can land hits.

The game itself is simple and an OK time-waster, but I do feel this type of game would get more use on a mobile platform rather than on Steam. I suggest that you consider where you buy it if the game interests you. AI games are quick and have a round limit, so I see it as a game that lends itself more to playing on a phone when you have a few minutes to kill as opposed to loading it up on a PC to play for an extended period.

Where it would shine on PC is the local VS mode. The games simplicity allows it to be played with a younger child or sibling as you take turns having your shot. I do feel the developer should open up all character for this mode as it would allow a level of variety in games and improve player longevity. I have attempted to find an online multiplayer match without success, which is expected seeing the game was just released.

The graphics look nice, nothing overly complex as you would expect from a mobile game. The music is also fine, but I found the sound effects annoying - especially the sound for when shots go out of bounds. This was the first thing I turned off, but when you restart the game the sound effects are back on even though the settings show they should be off. Turning them on and then off again removes them. I expect this will be patched soon.

For less than $2, I am happy to recommend this game, but do take into consideration if you would be more likely to play it on a mobile device or Steam before purchasing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061533882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1500151777}
review:
Udało mi się wygrać klucz na stronie FE do tej gry. Nie spodziewałem się niczego szczególnego, ale się jednak pomyliłem. Świetna prosta gierka. Bardzo podobna do Wormsów. A że uwielbiałem Wormsy i grałem w nie kiedyś godzinami z znajomymi to dla mnie ta gra jest świetna!!
Właśnie takie proste gry o świetnej grywalności z możliwością zagrania z znajomymi zostają najdłużej miło wspominane w pamięci.
